description: MCP Toolbox for Databases enables your agent to connect to your database.

lifecycle.reason: Missing required package metadata (runtimeHint or identifier)

name: io.github.googleapis/genai-toolbox

runtimeArguments.description: File path specifying the tool configuration.
runtimeArguments.name: --tools-file

runtimeArguments.description: Multiple file paths specifying tool configurations. Files will be merged. Cannot be used with –-tools-file or –-tools-folder.
runtimeArguments.name: --tools-files

runtimeArguments.description: Directory path containing YAML tool configuration files. All .yaml and .yml files in the directory will be loaded and merged. Cannot be used with –-tools-file or –-tools-files.
runtimeArguments.name: --tools-folder

runtimeArguments.description: Address of the interface the server will listen on.
runtimeArguments.name: --address

runtimeArguments.description: Port the server will listen on.
runtimeArguments.name: --port

runtimeArguments.description: Disables dynamic reloading of tools file.
runtimeArguments.name: --disable-reload

runtimeArguments.description: Use a prebuilt tool configuration by source type.
runtimeArguments.name: --prebuilt

runtimeArguments.description: Listens via MCP STDIO instead of acting as a remote HTTP server.
runtimeArguments.name: --stdio

runtimeArguments.description: Enable exporting directly to Google Cloud Monitoring.
runtimeArguments.name: --telemetry-gcp

runtimeArguments.description: Enable exporting using OpenTelemetry Protocol (OTLP) to the specified endpoint (e.g. 'http://127.0.0.1:4318').
runtimeArguments.name: --telemetry-otlp

runtimeArguments.description: Sets the value of the service.name resource attribute for telemetry data.
runtimeArguments.name: --telemetry-service-name

runtimeArguments.description: Launches the Toolbox UI web server.
runtimeArguments.name: --ui

runtimeArguments.description: Specifies a list of origins permitted to access this server.
runtimeArguments.name: --allowed-origins

title: MCP Toolbox for Databases
